thread.title: Two million British viewers watch Clarkson's new show
thread.title_full: Two million British viewers watch Clarkson's new show

title: Two million British viewers watch Clarkson's new show
text: Two million British viewers watch Clarkson's new show: The Grand Tour pulls in less than half of the audience of Top Gear New figures suggest viewing rates of The Grand Tour have plunged recently It was watched by just 2.3m UK viewers on Amazon Prime in December This was down from the 5.8 million the trio of presenters pulled for their last episode of Top Gear in June 2015 But analysts say the show is a success as its the most watched subscription only streamed programme and attracted new members to the video service
